Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent local Eye = Tool.Handle
Tool.Enabled = true
local vCharacter local myHumanoid local myTorso
local launchAnim
local activeEyes = {} local currentEye = 0 local numberOfEyes
local camera
local screenGui
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
function seeAll(key) local eyeCount = 0 key = key:lower() if #activeEyes > 0 and camera then if key == "q" then if currentEye + 1 > #activeEyes then currentEye = 0 end camera.CameraSubject = activeEyes[currentEye + 1] currentEye = currentEye + 1 camera.CameraType = 4 elseif key == "e" then if currentEye - 1 < 1 then currentEye = #activeEyes end camera.CameraSubject = activeEyes[currentEye - 1] currentEye = currentEye - 1 camera.CameraType = 4 elseif key == "x" then if camera then camera.CameraSubject = vCharacter camera.CameraType = 5 end elseif key == "t" then for i = 1, #activeEyes do local e = Instance.new("Explosion") e.Parent = game.Workspace e.BlastPressure = 1000000 e.BlastRadius = 2.0 e.Position = activeEyes[i].Position debris:AddItem(e, 1.5) activeEyes[i]:Remove() activeEyes[i] = nil eyeCount = eyeCount + 1 end numberOfEyes = Tool:FindFirstChild("NumberOfEyes") if numberOfEyes then numberOfEyes.Value = numberOfEyes.Value + eyeCount end end end end
function attach(eye, hit) if hit and hit.Parent ~= vCharacter and hit.Parent ~= Tool then Weld = Instance.new("Weld") Weld.Name = "EyeWeld" Weld.Part0 = hit Weld.Part1 = eye Weld.C1 = eye.CFrame:inverse() * hit.CFrame Weld.Parent = eye end end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
numberOfEyes = Tool:FindFirstChild("NumberOfEyes") if numberOfEyes then if numberOfEyes.Value <= 0 then return end end Tool.Enabled = false
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if myHumanoid == nil or myTorso == nil then return end
local target = myHumanoid.TargetPoint launchAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.LaunchAnim) if launchAnim then launchAnim:Play() end
wait(0.2)
numberOfEyes = Tool:FindFirstChild("NumberOfEyes") if numberOfEyes then numberOfEyes.Value = numberOfEyes.Value - 1 end
local eClone = Eye:Clone() eClone.CanCollide = true eClone.Parent = game.Workspace eClone.Velocity = myTorso.CFrame.lookVector * 30.0 eClone.Mesh.Scale = eClone.Mesh.Scale * 0.25 table.insert(activeEyes, eClone) eClone.Touched:connect(function(hit) attach(eClone, hit) end)
camera = game.Workspace.CurrentCamera
wait(1.0) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped(mouse) if mouse then mouse.KeyDown:connect(seeAll) end myCharacter = Tool.Parent myPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(myCharacter)
numberOfEyes = Tool:FindFirstChild("NumberOfEyes")
screenGui = Instance.new("ScreenGui") screenGui.Name = "EyesGui" if myPlayer then screenGui.Parent = myPlayer.PlayerGui end frame = Instance.new("Frame") frame.Name = "EyeContainer" frame.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0.75, 0) frame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 75, 0, 75) frame.Parent = screenGui frame.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0
image = Instance.new("ImageLabel") image.Name = "Eye" image.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=59803382" image.Parent = frame image.Size = UDim2.new(0, 75, 0, 75) image.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0
text = Instance.new("TextLabel") text.Text = numberOfEyes.Value
numberOfEyes.Changed:connect(function() text.Text = numberOfEyes.Value end) text.Position = UDim2.new(0.75, 0, 0.75, 0) text.Size = UDim2.new(0.5, 0, 0.5, 0) text.Parent = frame text.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 text.TextColor = BrickColor.new("Bright green") text.FontSize = 7
frame2 = Instance.new("Frame") frame2.Name = "Container2" frame2.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0.63, 0) frame2.Size = UDim2.new(0, 100, 0, 300) frame2.Parent = screenGui frame2.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0
image2 = Instance.new("ImageLabel") image2.Name = "Instructions" image2.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=59804020" image2.Parent = frame2 image2.Size = UDim2.new(0,250, 0, 75) image2.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0
end
function onUnequipped() if launchAnim then launchAnim:Stop() end if camera then camera.CameraSubject = vCharacter end for i = 1, #activeEyes do debris:AddItem(activeEyes[i], 2) end activeEyes = {} numberOfEyes = Tool:FindFirstChild("NumberOfEyes") if numberOfEyes then numberOfEyes.Value = 5 end if screenGui then screenGui:Remove() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)
